text:
Shania Twain is the latest addition to The Voice.

As Twain tweeted, she will be on the show on April 24, serving as the key advisor to the Top 12 contestants of the 12th season. She wrote:

“Excited to announce that I’ll appear on @nbcthevoice this month, as a mentor to the finalists. Tune in on Monday 24th April at 8 p.m. ET/PT.”

Twain has some experience in reality singing competition, as she was once a mentor for the contestants on American Idol.
title: Shania Twain Joins The Voice Season 12 as Key Advisor
